title: Cowboys, new NFL rule, Scottie Pippen, & top 5
itunes:title: Cowboys, new NFL rule, Scottie Pippen, & top 5
description:
Colin discusses the Dallas Cowboys possibly being close to getting a deal done with Dak Prescott, why he hopes a new rule NFL will get approved, why Scottie Pippen has nobody to blame but himself, and why he feels ESPN's new top 5 list is ridiculous. Guests include Spencer Dinwiddie, Peter Guber, Tom Izzo, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
